text:
I can’t believe this video was made entirely by AI.

And it's the worst it will ever be:

It's called Agent Opus (by OpusClip), an AI video agent built for social media. It combines 6 AI roles:

1. Researcher: finds reliable info
2. Scriptwriter: writes entire script
3. Storyboard Artist: plans every scene
4. Hook Designer: builds catchy openings
5. Motion Designer: adds smooth animations
6. Video Editor: polishes cuts and captions

They build the entire creative team into a single tool.

Here's exactly how to use it:

→ Join the waitlist. 
→ Use a reference video from the library.
→ Create your own video and type a prompt.
→ Pick a voice, filter sources, avatar & format.
→ Hit 'Generate' and let your AI team do the rest.

You must join the waitlist & hopefully get access to it. But I have a couple of accesses to give.

 You must have open DMs.
